div.p: I suppose they didn’t tell you that sometimes failure is OK, they didn’t tell you that when you go from the learning process
into a job the timescales and the pressures can be more intense, they give you the ideas to go and do it but I suppose it was going
from the learning part of it to being a day-to-day job that jump but I don’t suppose anyone can really tell you that.
I haven’t got like a mentor as such but at specific times in my life there’s been specific people that have actually said things which
stopped me from being blinkered in my view I think.
